label: Bb Display Entitlements
description: Displays entitlements for all system roles on the current Blackboard page.

label: Bb Role Compare
description: Compares system roles against a JSON file to highlight mismatches.

label: Bb Role Download
description: Downloads all system roles and their entitlements as a JSON file.

label: Bb Analytics IDs
description: Displays the Analytics ID when hovering over course links.

label: Bb User Details
description: Shows detailed user information on Blackboard pages.
